attributes.action: asset freeze on PM, Ministers & MPs who back sanctions/asset freezes
attributes.additional_details: Whenever Her Majesty's government seeks to enforce sanctions or asset-freezes on foreign states or persons, the Prime Minister, other ministers and any MPs or peers who back the proposal (should there be a vote in Parliament in addition to an order in council, otherwise only PM & ministers) will be subject to a freeze on all assets, incomes, emoluments, etc., other than a ministerial or parliamentary salary  until they (meaning PM, ministers, peers & MPs) declare the issue which caused the imposition of sanctions or asset-freeze resolved.
